Description: Ivory spoon-handle; broken both ends, but curving out to the bowl at one end, and an adornment at the other.
Curator's comments: Part of the bowl belonging to this spoon is registered as EA59637.
Bibliographic references: Brunton & Caton-Thompson 1928 / The Badarian Civilisation and Predynastic Remains near Badari (p. 31; pl. xxii.6, xxvi.1)
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
